/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on requesting corroboration of an in-service stressor, including
duties of the RO Research Coordinator
criteria for submission to MRRC
procedures for conducting RO Research Coordinator review
format of requests for stressor corroboration to MRRC
information to include in requests to MRRC for stressor corroboration
circumstances in which MRRC requests may be expedited
, and
invalid or incomplete research requests to MRRC
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information and Development for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Claims
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A
